title: Netflix Clone
description: A fully responsive web application that replicates the core features of Netflix, built with React, Styled Components, and Firebase for the backend.

title: Eccomerce Website
description: A complete e-commerce platform developed with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and integrated with the Stripe payment gateway.

title: Food Delivery App
description: A food delivery application created using the MERN stack, offering a seamless user experience for ordering food from various restaurants.
